name: Asahi CE & Europe Services s.r.o.
goal: We have given the world Pilsner Urquell, creating a new beer category, Pils. Nowadays we are at the forefront of the brewing industry in the Czech Republic and produce a number of popular brands. It is these brands that enable us to achieve our aim: to bring pleasure and enjoyment to beer lovers in the Czech Republic and all over the world.
interests: Consumers, Culture and media, Environment, Public Health, Taxation
euInitiatives: We are interested in the legislation with potential impact on beer industry in Czech Republic, especially environmental issues, audiovisual directives, tax directives and any European alcohol strategy.
